page.title: 17OWERMOIGNE WIFE'S DAY
page.content: {35 YEARS AGO MRS ENGLISH}LIVED IN A {TERRACED}TWO BEDROOMED HOUSE WITH A LEAN-TO{KITCHEN}AND AN{OUTSIDE TOILET. NOW SHE HAS A 3 BEDROOMED {SEMI-DETACHED}HOUSE WITH{2 INSIDE {TOILETS}.SHE HAD ONLY{COLD WATER}AND COOKED OVER A{COAL FIRE}WHILE TODAY SHE HAS{CENTRAL HEATING,ELECTRIC} {KETTLE, FAN OVEN AND A MICRO-WAVE}.SHE USED TO{LAUNDER}CLOTHES WITH A{POSS} {TUB, A WRINGER AND FLAT IRON.}SHE NOW HAS AN{AUTOMATIC WASHING MACHINE}AND A {TUMBLE DRYER}AND A{STEAM IRON}.SHE HAS AN{ELECTRIC BLANKET},AND IN THE KITCHEN,A{FREEZER,A FOOD MIXER AND } {TOASTER}.AS WELL AS READING BOOKS SHE NOW WATCHES{COLOUR T.V}.AND HAS A {RECORD PLAYER}AND{TAPE RECORDER}.SHE SAYS THAT{ELECTRICITY}HAS TRANSFORMED LIFE FOR THE MODERN HOUSEWIFE.
